author: Fred Sanford

author: Fred Sanford
text:
Nationalism is a dead end anyway. Not for moral reasons, but because it's logics don't work out. It's been studied to death. No need to care except for the issues its malcontents cause on the road to its inevitable failure.

https://t.co/nmAPTk2lG1 https://t.co/7lLBVf5SYk

author: Fred Sanford
text:
Many of them pity us. The world has moved on. We just don't know it yet. American hegemony is all but over.

https://t.co/BPZgSlGepH https://t.co/AqWqR9L4o1

author: Fred Sanford
text:
This is going back a decade in that even Nobel Prize winning economists writing for the Financial Times agrees. Outside of menial labor in the service economy, it's not the land of opportunity anymore.

author: Fred Sanford
text:
